And it came to pass the same year<S>8141</S>, in the beginning<S>7225</S> of the reign<S>4467</S> of Zedekiah<S>6667</S> king<S>4428</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, in the fourth<S>7243</S> year<S>8141</S>, and in the fifth<S>2549</S> month<S>2320</S>, that Hananiah<S>2608</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Azur<S>5809</S> the prophet<S>5030</S>, which was of Gibeon<S>1391</S>, spake<S>559</S> unto me in the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, in the presence<S>5869</S> of the priests<S>3548</S> and of all the people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Thus speaketh<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, saying<S>559</S>, I have broken<S>7665</S> the yoke<S>5923</S> of the king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S>.
Within two full<S>3117</S> years<S>8141</S> will I bring again<S>7725</S> into this place<S>4725</S> all the vessels<S>3627</S> of the LORD'S<S>3068</S> house<S>1004</S>, that Nebuchadnezzar<S>5019</S> king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S> took away<S>3947</S> from this place<S>4725</S>, and carried<S>935</S> them to Babylon<S>894</S>: <sup>two: Heb. two years of days</sup>
And I will bring again<S>7725</S> to this place<S>4725</S> Jeconiah<S>3204</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jehoiakim<S>3079</S> king<S>4428</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, with all the captives<S>1546</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, that went<S>935</S> into Babylon<S>894</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: for I will break<S>7665</S> the yoke<S>5923</S> of the king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S>. <sup>captives: Heb. captivity</sup>
Then the prophet<S>5030</S> Jeremiah<S>3414</S> said<S>559</S> unto the prophet<S>5030</S> Hananiah<S>2608</S> in the presence<S>5869</S> of the priests<S>3548</S>, and in the presence<S>5869</S> of all the people<S>5971</S> that stood<S>5975</S> in the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>,
Even the prophet<S>5030</S> Jeremiah<S>3414</S> said<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>: the LORD<S>3068</S> do<S>6213</S> so: the LORD<S>3068</S> perform<S>6965</S> thy words<S>1697</S> which thou hast prophesied<S>5012</S>, to bring again<S>7725</S> the vessels<S>3627</S> of the LORD'S<S>3068</S> house<S>1004</S>, and all that is carried away captive<S>1473</S>, from Babylon<S>894</S> into this place<S>4725</S>.
Nevertheless hear<S>8085</S> thou now this word<S>1697</S> that I speak<S>1696</S> in thine ears<S>241</S>, and in the ears<S>241</S> of all the people<S>5971</S>;
The prophets<S>5030</S> that have been before<S>6440</S> me and before<S>6440</S> thee of old<S>5769</S> prophesied<S>5012</S> both against many<S>7227</S> countries<S>776</S>, and against great<S>1419</S> kingdoms<S>4467</S>, of war<S>4421</S>, and of evil<S>7451</S>, and of pestilence<S>1698</S>.
The prophet<S>5030</S> which prophesieth<S>5012</S> of peace<S>7965</S>, when the word<S>1697</S> of the prophet<S>5030</S> shall come to pass<S>935</S>, then <S>227</S> shall the prophet<S>5030</S> be known<S>3045</S>, that the LORD<S>3068</S> hath truly<S>571</S> sent<S>7971</S> him.
Then Hananiah<S>2608</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> took<S>3947</S> the yoke<S>4133</S> from off the prophet<S>5030</S> Jeremiah's<S>3414</S> neck<S>6677</S>, and brake<S>7665</S> it.
And Hananiah<S>2608</S> spake<S>559</S> in the presence<S>5869</S> of all the people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; Even so will I break<S>7665</S> the yoke<S>5923</S> of Nebuchadnezzar<S>5019</S> king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S> from the neck<S>6677</S> of all nations<S>1471</S> within the space of two full<S>3117</S> years<S>8141</S>. And the prophet<S>5030</S> Jeremiah<S>3414</S> went<S>3212</S> his way<S>1870</S>.
Then the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto Jeremiah<S>3414</S> the prophet, after<S>310</S> that Hananiah<S>2608</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> had broken<S>7665</S> the yoke<S>4133</S> from off the neck<S>6677</S> of the prophet<S>5030</S> Jeremiah<S>3414</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Go<S>1980</S> and tell<S>559</S> Hananiah<S>2608</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; Thou hast broken<S>7665</S> the yokes<S>4133</S> of wood<S>6086</S>; but thou shalt make<S>6213</S> for them yokes<S>4133</S> of iron<S>1270</S>.
For thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; I have put<S>5414</S> a yoke<S>5923</S> of iron<S>1270</S> upon the neck<S>6677</S> of all these nations<S>1471</S>, that they may serve<S>5647</S> Nebuchadnezzar<S>5019</S> king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S>; and they shall serve<S>5647</S> him: and I have given<S>5414</S> him the beasts<S>2416</S> of the field<S>7704</S> also.
Then said<S>559</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> Jeremiah<S>3414</S> unto Hananiah<S>2608</S> the prophet<S>5030</S>, Hear<S>8085</S> now, Hananiah<S>2608</S>; The LORD<S>3068</S> hath not sent<S>7971</S> thee; but thou makest this people<S>5971</S> to trust<S>982</S> in a lie<S>8267</S>.
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; Behold, I will cast<S>7971</S> thee from off the face<S>6440</S> of the earth<S>127</S>: this year<S>8141</S> thou shalt die<S>4191</S>, because thou hast taught<S>1696</S> rebellion<S>5627</S> against the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>rebellion: Heb. revolt</sup>
So Hananiah<S>2608</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> died<S>4191</S> the same year<S>8141</S> in the seventh<S>7637</S> month<S>2320</S>.
